title: Sam Akromah
text: Sam Akromah (born 19 March 1960) is a <a href="Ghanaian%20people">Ghanaian</a> <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="super%20featherweight">super feather</a>/<a href="lightweight">light</a>/<a href="light%20welterweight">light welterweight</a> <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> of the 1980s and '90s who won the Ghanaian lightweight title, Ghanaian super featherweight title, and <a href="List%20of%20Commonwealth%20Boxing%20Council%20Champions%23super%20featherweight">Commonwealth super featherweight title</a>, and was a challenger for the African Boxing Union lightweight title against <a href="Christopher%20Ossai">Christopher Ossai</a><a href="http%3A//boxrec.com/list_bouts.php%3Fhuman_id%3D47338%26amp%3Bcat%3Dboxer"></a>, and Ghanaian light welterweight title against <a href="Kofi%20Jantuah">Kofi Jantuah</a>, his professional fighting weight varied from , i.e. <a href="super%20featherweight">super featherweight</a> to , i.e. <a href="light%20welterweight">light welterweight</a>.
